law.catch_line: Creditable service on which the allowance of a member is based consists of:...

text.section:
Creditable service on which the allowance of a member is based consists of:
eligibility service, except as provided in subsection (b) of this section; and
credit for unused sick leave as provided in § 20-206 of this article.
A member's creditable service for a period of regular part-time employment equals the member's actual employment during that period.
